State: Total with each policy (out of 51 with DC)

Closed K-12 public schools: Did not require executive order if department of education closed all public schools. If spring break prior to closure, considered closure to begin on first day of spring break. If closure announced on weekend, first week day closed is listed. If closure announced in evening, considered to apply to next day. Some states only applied order to public schools.
Closed day cares: If closure announced in evening, considered to apply to next day. If closure announced on weekend, first week day closed is listed.
Began to reopen businesses statewide: *the date a state first reopened any business that was originally ordered to close. Only included if it applies to entire state.

Closed K-12 public schools: If not specified in order, the date of closure was the first school day after a closure order was signed
